org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.value

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.value.Value

  • public class Value
extends java.lang.Object
    Common class for handling values. It is always recommended to check the type before using a getter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
